features.title: GroupDocs.Merger features
features.description: Seamlessly merge, split, and manipulate PDF and Office Documents

feature_1.title: Merge files
feature_1.content: Combine two or more documents into a single document, merging specific pages or page ranges from multiple source documents.

feature_2.title: Split documents
feature_2.content: Divide a source document into multiple resultant documents using the split operation.

feature_3.title: Move pages
feature_3.content: Reposition pages within a document using the MovePage feature.

feature_4.title: Remove pages
feature_4.content: Remove individual pages or a collection of specific page numbers from the source document.

feature_5.title: Rotate pages
feature_5.content: Rotate pages within a document by setting the rotation angle to 90, 180, or 270 degrees using the RotatePages operation.

feature_6.title: Swap pages
feature_6.content: Exchange the positions of two pages within the source document, creating a new document with swapped page positions.

feature_7.title: Extract pages
feature_7.content: Extract specific pages or page ranges from a source document, generating a new document containing only the selected pages.

feature_8.title: Change orientation
feature_8.content: Set the page orientation (portrait or landscape) for specific or all pages of the document using the ChangeOrientation operation.

feature_9.title: Preview pages
feature_9.content: Generate image representations of document pages to understand the content and structure better. Make previews of all or just specific pages.
